mailBody:
Dear [Recipient's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. We are currently completing our documentation for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) and noticed that some important information is still pending.

Specifically, we would like to request the following details:  
1. PEP Screening Data  
2. Revenue Details  
3. Market Capitalization Data  

Your prompt response will greatly assist us in ensuring that all documentation is accurate and complete. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Best Regards,
[Your Name] 
[Your Position] 
[Your Contact Information]
